name: Disconnect puzzle game
description:
Disconnect

aka Anti Connect 4 aka Not-A-Tic-Tac-Toe.
Fill the board, but don't put too many successive tokens of the same color.

Over 1000 puzzles with different sizes, ranging from small and easy 5x5, to harder 14x14. In each level, there are 2 or 3 token types. Levels have multiple solutions.

Four Types
  • Blue and Black - Max 3 successive ✔
  • Red - Max 4 successive ✔
  • Green - Max 2 successive ✔
Drag and Drop Click or Tap
